title: It's great to see that all the WC Games are going to start onwards of Midnight AEST.
body:
Great planning right there. I remember a few seasons ago EU LCS games would start at like 4/5am AEST which was equivalent to something like 10am CEST.

I thought for sure Riot would at least try to cater toward the bigger Region's timezones like Korea. Pretty sure Korea is GMT +9 and Australia/OCE is GMT +9/9.5/10. I think even China is only GMT +8.

replies.body: its gonna be uploaded literally minutes after the end of each match
